org.apache.flink.runtime.state.memory

类 MemoryStateBackend

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.AbstractStateBackend
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.memory.MemoryStateBackend
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, Serializable, AutoCloseable

    public class MemoryStateBackend
extends AbstractStateBackend
    A AbstractStateBackend that stores all its data and checkpoints in memory and has no capabilities to spill to disk. Checkpoints are serialized and the serialized data is transferred
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  MemoryStateBackend.MemoryCheckpointOutputStream
      A CheckpointStateOutputStream that writes into a byte array.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MemoryStateBackend()
      Creates a new memory state backend that accepts states whose serialized forms are up to the default state size (5 MB).
      MemoryStateBackend(int maxStateSize)
      Creates a new memory state backend that accepts states whose serialized forms are up to the given number of bytes.

      Closes the state backend, dropping and aborting all I/O operations that are currently pending.

        public MemoryStateBackend()

      • MemoryStateBackend

        public MemoryStateBackend(int maxStateSize)
        Creates a new memory state backend that accepts states whose serialized forms are up to the given number of bytes.
        参数:
        maxStateSize - The maximal size of the serialized state

      • checkpointStateSerializable

        public <S extends Serializable> StateHandle<S> checkpointStateSerializable(S state,
                                                                           long checkpointID,
                                                                           long timestamp)
                                                                    throws Exception
        Serialized the given state into bytes using Java serialization and creates a state handle that can re-create that state.
        指定者:
        checkpointStateSerializable 在类中 AbstractStateBackend
        类型参数:
        S - The type of the state.
        参数:
        state - The state to checkpoint.
        checkpointID - The ID of the checkpoint.
        timestamp - The timestamp of the checkpoint.
        返回:
        A state handle that contains the given state serialized as bytes.
        抛出:
        Exception - Thrown, if the serialization fails.

      • createCheckpointStateOutputStream

        public AbstractStateBackend.CheckpointStateOutputStream createCheckpointStateOutputStream(long checkpointID,
                                                                                          long timestamp)
                                                                                   throws Exception
        从类复制的说明: AbstractStateBackend
        Creates an output stream that writes into the state of the given checkpoint. When the stream is closes, it returns a state handle that can retrieve the state back.
        指定者:
        createCheckpointStateOutputStream 在类中 AbstractStateBackend
        参数:
        checkpointID - The ID of the checkpoint.
        timestamp - The timestamp of the checkpoint.
        返回:
        An output stream that writes state for the given checkpoint.
        抛出:
        Exception - Exceptions may occur while creating the stream and should be forwarded.
